product.title: Whitfield Cotton
product.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 1330mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 51% cotton / 49% polyester guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro.

This soft cotton white coloured screen fabric, in its uplifitng shade and clean finish, creates a centre point of your window. relproducts.title: Mood Fr Voile Cotton White Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cotton white is a semi-translucent stylish, light white roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern white shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant coating makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

relproducts.title: Antiviral Cotton Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Cool, creamy and bright, this clean and simple off-white roller blind will diffuse the light coming into your space for a light, but private, glow.
